title: How to Optimize Your Ranch Operation

tasks.task: I think that covers it. The transcript might be a bit vague on some steps of the rotation setup, but the key tasks around rotational grazing, animal movement, and performance monitoring are present. So the MAINTASK would be the introduction of rotational grazing, with listed subtasks. Then just accepting that this is about agricultural practices based on the content.
